unicef-ah3.def: The annual rate of reduction in adolescent mortality rate (AMR) defined as AMR=100*(ln(AMRt2/AMRt1)/(t1-t2)), where t1=2000 and t2=2019.
unicef-ah3.name: Annual rate of reduction in the adolescent mortality rate, Aged 10-19
unicef-ah3.source: United Nations Inter-agency Group for Child Mortality Estimation (UNICEF, World Health Organization, United Nations Population Division and the World Bank Group). Last update: September 2020.
unicef-ah3.dataset: United Nations Inter-agency Group for Child Mortality Estimation (UNICEF, World Health Organization, United Nations Population Division and the World Bank Group). Last update: September 2020.
